content.text:
Bed Times

My {l}Parents are {-|is} strict about bedtime. I go to bed at nine o’clock every night. I don’t think this is fair. I should be allowed to stay up later on Fridays and {u}saturdays. My mom says I need ten hours of sleep. I have to get up early on school days, so nine o’clock is a good bedtime{.} But on Saturday and Sunday, I don’t have to catch the school bus. I can get up later. So, I should be allowed to go to bed later{.} If I stayed up later on weekends, I could watch more shows. I could play checkers with my dad. I’d even have more time for {-|four} my homework.
